location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, HM Charge d'affairs at the Court of Persia to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the sending of a representative to witness the punishment of the men who insulted John Williams in Shiraz and whether or not the Prince at Shiraz will carry out his orders.The letter is undated, but was received at Bushire during May 1818.
